00035   //A run time expression
00036   template <typename InterfaceType /* see forwards.h for default argument */>
00037   class rt_binary_expr : public InterfaceType
00038   {
00039     typedef op_interface<InterfaceType>                                           op_interface_type;
00040     typedef op_unary<op_id<typename InterfaceType::numeric_type>, InterfaceType>  op_unary_id_type;
00041     
00042       typedef rt_binary_expr<InterfaceType>    self_type;
00043     
00044     public:
00045       typedef typename InterfaceType::numeric_type         numeric_type;
00046 //       explicit expr(InterfaceType * lhs,
00047 //                     op_interface         * op,
00048 //                     InterfaceType * rhs) : lhs_(lhs), op_(op), rhs_(rhs) {}
00049       rt_binary_expr() {}
00050 
00051       explicit rt_binary_expr(InterfaceType * lhs,
00052                            op_interface_type         * op,
00053                            InterfaceType * rhs) : lhs_(lhs),
00054                                                          op_(op),
00055                                                          rhs_(rhs) {}
00056                     
00057       template <typename LHS, typename OP, typename RHS>
00058       explicit rt_binary_expr(ct_binary_expr<LHS, OP, RHS> const & other) : op_(new op_binary<OP, InterfaceType>())
00059       {
00060         //std::cout << "Constructing from expression " << other << std::endl;
00061         lhs_ = std::auto_ptr<InterfaceType>(new rt_binary_expr<InterfaceType>(other.lhs()));
00062         rhs_ = std::auto_ptr<InterfaceType>(new rt_binary_expr<InterfaceType>(other.rhs()));
00063       }
00064 
00066       template <typename LHS, typename OP, long value>
00067       explicit rt_binary_expr(ct_binary_expr<LHS, OP, ct_constant<value> > const & other) : op_(new op_binary<OP, InterfaceType>())
00068       {
00069         //std::cout << "Constructing from expression " << other << std::endl;
00070         lhs_ = std::auto_ptr<InterfaceType>(new rt_binary_expr<InterfaceType>(other.lhs()));
00071         rhs_ = std::auto_ptr<InterfaceType>(new rt_constant<numeric_type, InterfaceType>(value));
00072       }
00073 
00074       template <long value, typename OP, typename RHS>
00075       explicit rt_binary_expr(ct_binary_expr<ct_constant<value>, OP, RHS > const & other) : op_(new op_binary<OP, InterfaceType>())
00076       {
00077         //std::cout << "Constructing from expression " << other << std::endl;
00078         lhs_ = std::auto_ptr<InterfaceType>(new rt_constant<numeric_type, InterfaceType>(value));
00079         rhs_ = std::auto_ptr<InterfaceType>(new rt_binary_expr<InterfaceType>(other.rhs()));
00080       }
00081 
00082       template <long value1, typename OP, long value2>
00083       explicit rt_binary_expr(ct_binary_expr<ct_constant<value1>, OP, ct_constant<value2> > const & other) : op_(new op_unary_id_type())
00084       {
00085         //std::cout << "Constructing from expression " << other << " to " << OP::apply(value1, value2) << std::endl;
00086         lhs_ = std::auto_ptr<InterfaceType>(new rt_constant<numeric_type, InterfaceType>(OP::apply(value1, value2)));
00087         rhs_ = std::auto_ptr<InterfaceType>(new rt_constant<numeric_type, InterfaceType>(OP::apply(value1, value2)));
00088       }
00089 
00091       template <typename LHS, typename OP, id_type id>
00092       explicit rt_binary_expr(ct_binary_expr<LHS, OP, ct_variable<id> > const & other) : op_(new op_binary<OP, InterfaceType>())
00093       {
00094         //std::cout << "Constructing from expression " << other << std::endl;
00095         lhs_ = std::auto_ptr<InterfaceType>(new rt_binary_expr<InterfaceType>(other.lhs()));
00096         rhs_ = std::auto_ptr<InterfaceType>(new rt_variable<InterfaceType>(id));
00097       }
00098

00101       {
00102         //std::cout << "Constructing from expression " << other << std::endl;
00103         lhs_ = std::auto_ptr<InterfaceType>(new rt_variable<InterfaceType>(id));
00104         rhs_ = std::auto_ptr<InterfaceType>(new rt_binary_expr<InterfaceType>(other.rhs()));
00105       }

00109       {
00110         //std::cout << "Constructing from expression " << other << " to " << OP::apply(value1, value2) << std::endl;

00121         rhs_ = std::auto_ptr<InterfaceType>(new rt_constant<numeric_type, InterfaceType>(value));
00122       }

00149                                                op_(other.op_->clone()),
00150                                                rhs_(other.rhs_->clone()) {}

00152       //assignments:                           
00153       template <typename LHS, typename OP, typename RHS>
00154       rt_binary_expr & operator=(ct_binary_expr<LHS, OP, RHS> const & other) 
00155       {
00156         lhs_ = std::auto_ptr<InterfaceType>(new rt_binary_expr<InterfaceType>(other.lhs()));
00157         op_ = std::auto_ptr<op_interface_type>(new op_binary<OP, InterfaceType>());
00158         rhs_ = std::auto_ptr<InterfaceType>(new rt_binary_expr<InterfaceType>(other.rhs()));
00159         return *this;
00160       }
00161       
00162       template <typename LHS, typename OP, long value>
00163       rt_binary_expr & operator=(ct_binary_expr<LHS, OP, ct_constant<value> > const & other)
00164       {
00165         //std::cout << "Constructing from expression " << other << std::endl;
00166         lhs_ = std::auto_ptr<InterfaceType>(new rt_binary_expr<InterfaceType>(other.lhs()));
00167         op_ = std::auto_ptr<op_interface_type>(new op_binary<OP, InterfaceType>());
00168         rhs_ = std::auto_ptr<InterfaceType>(new rt_constant<numeric_type, InterfaceType>(value));
00169         return *this;
00170       }
00171 
00172       template <long value, typename OP, typename RHS>
00173       rt_binary_expr & operator=(ct_binary_expr<ct_constant<value>, OP, RHS > const & other)
00174       {
00175         //std::cout << "Constructing from expression " << other << std::endl;
00176         lhs_ = std::auto_ptr<InterfaceType>(new rt_constant<numeric_type, InterfaceType>(value));
00177         op_ = std::auto_ptr<op_interface_type>(new op_binary<OP, InterfaceType>());
00178         rhs_ = std::auto_ptr<InterfaceType>(new rt_binary_expr<InterfaceType>(other.rhs()));
00179         return *this;
00180       }
00181 
00182       template <long value1, typename OP, long value2>
00183       rt_binary_expr & operator=(ct_binary_expr<ct_constant<value1>, OP, ct_constant<value2> > const & other)
00184       {
00185         //std::cout << "Constructing from expression " << other << std::endl;
00186         lhs_ = std::auto_ptr<InterfaceType>(new rt_constant<numeric_type, InterfaceType>(OP().apply(value1, value2)));
00187         op_  = std::auto_ptr<op_interface_type>(new op_unary_id_type());
00188         rhs_ = std::auto_ptr<InterfaceType>(new rt_constant<numeric_type, InterfaceType>(OP().apply(value1, value2)));
00189         return *this;
00190       }
00191       
00192 
00193       rt_binary_expr & operator=(rt_binary_expr const & other) 
00194       {
00195         lhs_ = std::auto_ptr<InterfaceType>(other.lhs()->clone());
00196         op_  = std::auto_ptr<op_interface_type>(other.op()->clone());
00197         rhs_ = std::auto_ptr<InterfaceType>(other.rhs()->clone());
00198         return *this;
00199       }

00201       template <typename ScalarType>
00202       rt_binary_expr & operator=(rt_constant<ScalarType> const & other)
00203       {
00204         lhs_ = std::auto_ptr<InterfaceType>(other.clone());
00205         op_  = std::auto_ptr<op_interface_type>(new op_unary_id_type());
00206         rhs_ = std::auto_ptr<InterfaceType>(other.clone());
00207         return *this;
00208       }

00210       template <long value>
00211       rt_binary_expr & operator=(ct_constant<value> const & other)
00212       {
00213         return *this = value;
00214       }
00215 
00216       rt_binary_expr & operator=(numeric_type value)
00217       {
00218         lhs_ = std::auto_ptr<InterfaceType>(new rt_constant<numeric_type, InterfaceType>(value));
00219         op_  = std::auto_ptr<op_interface_type>(new op_unary_id_type());
00220         rhs_ = std::auto_ptr<InterfaceType>(new rt_constant<numeric_type, InterfaceType>(value));
00221         return *this;
00222       }

00224       const InterfaceType      * lhs() const { return lhs_.get(); }
00225       const op_interface_type  * op()  const { return op_.get(); }
00226       const InterfaceType      * rhs() const { return rhs_.get(); }
00227

00230       //operator() is a convenience layer:
00231       numeric_type operator()(numeric_type val) const
00232       {
00233         return this->eval(val);
00234       }
00235 
00236       template <typename ScalarType>
00237       numeric_type operator()(rt_constant<ScalarType> val) const
00238       {
00239         return this->eval(static_cast<numeric_type>(val));
00240       }
00241       
00242       template <long value>
00243       numeric_type operator()(ct_constant<value> val) const
00244       {
00245         return this->eval(value);
00246       }
00247 
00248       template <typename VectorType>
00249       numeric_type operator()(VectorType const & v) const
00250       {
00251         std::vector<double> stl_v(v.size());
00252         for (std::size_t i=0; i<v.size(); ++i)
00253           stl_v[i] = v[i];
00254         
00255         return this->eval(stl_v);
00256       }
00257 
00258       numeric_type operator()(std::vector<numeric_type> const & stl_v) const
00259       {
00260         return this->eval(stl_v);
00261       }
00262 
00263       template <typename T0>
00264       numeric_type operator()(viennamath::ct_vector_1<T0> const & v) const
00265       {
00266         std::vector<double> stl_v(1);
00267         stl_v[0] = v[ct_index<0>()];
00268         return this->eval(stl_v);
00269       }
00270 
00271       template <typename T0, typename T1>
00272       numeric_type operator()(viennamath::ct_vector_2<T0, T1> const & v) const
00273       {
00274         std::vector<double> stl_v(2);
00275         stl_v[0] = v[ct_index<0>()];
00276         stl_v[1] = v[ct_index<1>()];
00277         return this->eval(stl_v);
00278       }
00279       
00280       template <typename T0, typename T1, typename T2>
00281       numeric_type operator()(viennamath::ct_vector_3<T0, T1, T2> const & v) const
00282       {
00283         std::vector<double> stl_v(3);
00284         stl_v[0] = v[ct_index<0>()];
00285         stl_v[1] = v[ct_index<1>()];
00286         stl_v[2] = v[ct_index<2>()];
00287         return this->eval(stl_v);
00288       }
00289       
00290       //virtual functions for evaluations
00291       numeric_type eval(std::vector<double> const & v) const
00292       {
00293         return op_->apply(lhs_.get()->eval(v), rhs_.get()->eval(v));
00294       }
00295 
00296       numeric_type eval(numeric_type val) const
00297       {
00298         return op_->apply(lhs_.get()->eval(val), rhs_.get()->eval(val));
00299       }
00300 
00302       
00303       
00304       InterfaceType * optimize() const
00305       {
00306         if (lhs_->is_constant() && rhs_->is_constant())
00307           return new rt_constant<numeric_type, InterfaceType>( unwrap() );
00308         
00309         //std::cout << "Optimization forwarded to " << op_->str() << std::endl;
00310         return op_->optimize(lhs_.get(), rhs_.get());
00311       }
00312       
00313       bool optimizable() const
00314       {
00315         if (lhs_->is_constant() && rhs_->is_constant())
00316         {
00317           //std::cout << "optimizable(): true in rt_binary_expr" << std::endl;
00318           return true;
00319         }
00320         return op_->optimizable(lhs_.get(), rhs_.get());
00321       }
00322       
00324       InterfaceType * clone() const { return new rt_binary_expr(lhs_->clone(), op_->clone(), rhs_->clone()); }
00325       std::string deep_str() const
00326       {
00327         std::stringstream ss;
00328         ss << "(";
00329         ss << lhs_->deep_str();
00330         ss << op_->str();
00331         ss << rhs_->deep_str();
00332         ss << ")";
00333         return ss.str();        
00334       }
00335       
00336       std::string shallow_str() const
00337       {
00338         return std::string("binary_expr");
00339       }
00340       
00341       bool is_unary() const { return false; }
00342       
00343       numeric_type unwrap() const
00344       {
00345         //if (op_->is_unary())
00346         //  return lhs_->unwrap();
00347         return op_->apply(lhs_->unwrap(), rhs_->unwrap());
00348       }
00349       
00350       bool is_constant() const { return lhs_->is_constant() && rhs_->is_constant(); };
00351       
00352       InterfaceType * substitute(const InterfaceType * e,
00353                                  const InterfaceType * repl) const
00354       {
00355         if (deep_equal(e))
00356           return repl->clone();
00357         
00358         return new rt_binary_expr(lhs_->substitute(e, repl),
00359                                op_->clone(),
00360                                rhs_->substitute(e, repl) ); 
00361       };
00362 
00363       InterfaceType * substitute(std::vector<const InterfaceType *> const &  e,
00364                                  std::vector<const InterfaceType *> const &  repl) const
00365       {
00366         for (size_t i=0; i<e.size(); ++i)
00367           if (deep_equal(e[i]))
00368             return repl[i]->clone();
00369         
00370         return new rt_binary_expr(lhs_->substitute(e, repl),
00371                                op_->clone(),
00372                                rhs_->substitute(e, repl) ); 
00373       };
00374       
00375       
00376       bool deep_equal(const InterfaceType * other) const
00377       {
00378         if (dynamic_cast< const rt_binary_expr * >(other) != NULL)
00379         {
00380           const rt_binary_expr * temp = dynamic_cast< const rt_binary_expr * >(other);
00381           return lhs_->deep_equal(temp->lhs())
00382                  && op_->equal(temp->op())
00383                  && rhs_->deep_equal(temp->rhs());
00384         }
00385         return false;
00386         //return lhs_->deep_equal(other) && rhs_->deep_equal(other);
00387       }
00388 
00389       bool shallow_equal(const InterfaceType * other) const
00390       {
00391         return dynamic_cast< const self_type * >(other) != NULL;
00392       }
00393 
00394       InterfaceType * diff(const InterfaceType * diff_var) const
00395       {
00396         return op_->diff(lhs_.get(), rhs_.get(), diff_var);
00397       }
00398 
00399       InterfaceType * recursive_manipulation(rt_manipulation_wrapper<InterfaceType> const & fw) const
00400       {
00401         if (fw.modifies(this))
00402           return fw(this);
00403 
00404         return new rt_binary_expr(lhs_->recursive_manipulation(fw),
00405                                op_->clone(),
00406                                rhs_->recursive_manipulation(fw) ); 
00407       }
00408 
00409       void recursive_traversal(rt_traversal_wrapper<InterfaceType> const & fw) const
00410       {
00411         if (fw.step_into(this))
00412         {
00413           lhs_->recursive_traversal(fw);
00414           fw(this);
00415           rhs_->recursive_traversal(fw);
00416         }
00417         else
00418           fw(this);
00419       }
00420 
00421     private:
00422       std::auto_ptr<InterfaceType>         lhs_;
00423       std::auto_ptr<op_interface_type>     op_;
00424       std::auto_ptr<InterfaceType>         rhs_;
00425   };
00426   
00427   
00428   template <typename InterfaceType>
00429   std::ostream& operator<<(std::ostream & stream, rt_binary_expr<InterfaceType> const & e)
00430   {
00431     stream << "expr" 
00432            << e.deep_str()
00433            << "";
00434     return stream;
00435   }
00436 
00437   template <typename T, typename InterfaceType>
00438   InterfaceType * op_unary<T, InterfaceType>::optimize(const InterfaceType * lhs,
00439                                                       const InterfaceType * rhs) const
00440   {
00441     return new rt_binary_expr<InterfaceType>(lhs->clone(),
00442                                           new op_unary<T, InterfaceType>(),
00443                                           rhs->clone());
00444   }
